title: The Hope Handbook for Christians: The Search for Personal Growth
description: Written for readers who are concerned about personal growth, the best-selling, the Hope Handbook Series, focuses attention on YOU being in control of what you can control — your thoughts, your attitude, and self-affirmation. The empowering series of hope handbooks will challenge you to take responsibility for your own happiness and each book encourages you to be a better you. Written for Christians, this book will teach you to embrace God’s grace for a more fulfilling life. This book will help you change your perspective and mindset to a more happy and glorious one, one day at a time.
author: Germany Kent
